case.title: Checking action for approving income transaction with positive value

custom.preconds: Testing environment - https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/ Internet Browser - Google Chrome Version 110.0.5481.78 (Official version) (64-bit) Add-ins - AdBlock

step.content: Entering test environment website landing page and logging in with previousely created user account
step.expected: Successfull logging in and entering kapusta web app

step.content: Choose income transaction name (type), add correct value and description
step.expected: name (type), value and description have been chosen and typed

step.content: Check if after clicking "ENTER" for icome transaction: - the transaction is added - account balance increases -An increase appear in the value of the transaction amount in the summary in the month in which the transaction was added
step.expected: After clicking "ENTER" for icome transaction, certain actions happen: -the transaction is added -account balance increases -An increase appear in the value of the transaction amount in the summary in the month in which the transaction was added

case.title: Checking action for approving income transaction with negative value

custom.preconds: Testing environment - https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/ Internet Browser - Google Chrome Version 110.0.5481.78 (Official version) (64-bit) Add-ins - AdBlock

step.content: Entering test environment website landing page and logging in with previousely created user account
step.expected: Successfull logging in and entering kapusta web app

step.content: Choose income transaction name (type), add incorrect value and description
step.expected: name (type), value and description have been chosen and typed

step.content: Check if after clicking "ENTER" for icome transaction: - the transaction is added - account balance decreases - a decrease appear in the value of the transaction amount in the summary in the month in which the transaction was added
step.expected: After clicking "ENTER" certain actions happen: -Web app shows error about violation of the rules -the transaction is not added

case.title: Checking effect of deleting income transaction to account balance

custom.preconds: Testing environment - https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/ Internet Browser - Google Chrome Version 110.0.5481.78 (Official version) (64-bit) Add-ins - AdBlock

step.content: Entering test environment website landing page and logging in with previousely created user account
step.expected: Successfull logging in and entering kapusta web app

step.content:
Check if when deleting a transaction:
- the value in the Balance field decreases by the value of the deleted transaction amount (in the case of an income transaction) - the value in the summary in the month from which the deleted transaction originates decreases by the amount of this transaction.
step.expected:
When deleting a transaction:
- the value in the Balance field decreases by the value of the deleted transaction amount (in the case of an income transaction) - the value in the summary in the month from which the deleted transaction originates decreases by the amount of this transaction.

case.title: Checking effect of deleting expense transaction to account balance

step.content: Entering test environment website landing page and logging in with previousely created user account
step.expected: Successfull logging in and entering kapusta web app

step.content:
Check if when deleting a transaction:
- the value in the Balance field increases by the value of the deleted transaction amount (in the case of an expensetransaction) - the value in the summary in the month from which the deleted transaction originates decreases by the amount of this transaction.
step.expected:
When deleting a transaction:
- the value in the Balance field decreases by the value of the deleted transaction amount (in the case of an income transaction) - the value in the summary in the month from which the deleted transaction originates decreases by the amount of this transaction.

case.title: Checking appearance of scroll bar when exceeding number of transactions on window

step.expected: Successfull logging in and entering kapusta web app

step.expected: transactions are added

step.content: Check if when more transactions have been entered than fit in the list of transactions - a scroll bar appears on the right side and the keyboard arrows or scroll with the mouse/touchpad can be used to scroll through the list of transactions.
step.expected: A scroll bar appears on the right side and the keyboard arrows or scroll with the mouse/touchpad can be used to scroll through the list of transactions.
